code: import i18n from"i18next";import{initReactI18next}from"react-i18next";import LanguageDetector from"i18next-browser-languagedetector";import moment from"moment";import{TRANSLATIONS_TH,TRANSLATIONS_EN}from".";import{DEFAULT_LANGUAGE}from"@configs";i18n.use(LanguageDetector).use(initReactI18next).init({interpolation:{format:function format(value,_format){if(value instanceof Date)return moment(value).format(_format);return value;}},resources:{en:{translation:TRANSLATIONS_EN},th:{translation:TRANSLATIONS_TH}}});i18n.changeLanguage(DEFAULT_LANGUAGE);
